Package repository

Class UserRepository

java.lang.Object
repository.UserRepository
public class UserRepository
extends java.lang.Object
This repository class provide a higher level of First Level Division data CRUD manipulation and also aims to hide their complexities.

    • matchUsernameAndPassword

      public static User matchUsernameAndPassword​(java.lang.String userNameInput, java.lang.String passwordInput)
      The purpose of the class to check if the username and password record within the database
      Parameters:
      userNameInput - the input of username from the login screen
      passwordInput - the input of password from the login screen
      Returns:
      null to indicate that its not found otherwise returns the matching user data

    • matchUsername

      public static boolean matchUsername​(java.lang.String userNameInput)
      This class is execute to check the input of username is found in the database in that way, program can let user know that only the password is incorrect.
      Parameters:
      userNameInput - the username input from the login screen
      Returns:
      true if the username was recorded in the database.
